titles.title: Medicaid Transformation Grant Act of 2005

To amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to provide health information technology grants to States and transform the Medicaid Program by reducing the number of medical and medication errors, unnecessary hospitalizations, infections and inappropriate care that exists within the current system and save thousands of lives and tens of billions of dollars a year.
Medicaid Transformation Grant Act of 2005

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary: Medicaid Transformation Grant Act of 2005 - Amends title XIX (Medicaid) of the Social Security Act to direct the Secretary of Health and Human Services to provide for grants to states for the adoption of innovative methods to improve the effectiveness and efficiency in providing medical assistance.
